scripts.build: yarn run build-frontend && yarn run build-backend
scripts.dev:mongodb: docker run --name dev_mongodb --rm -p 27017:27017 -e MONGO_INITDB_DATABASE=admin -e MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME=root -e MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD=rootpwd -e MONGO_AUTH_SOURCE=test -e MONGO_USER=testUser -e MONGO_PASSWORD=pwd joeyjackson/shape-drawer-mongodb
scripts.dev: concurrently "yarn run dev:mongodb" "tsc -w" "cross-env NODE_ENV=development MONGO_AUTH_SOURCE=test MONGO_USER=testUser MONGO_PASSWORD=pwd nodemon backend/dist/app.js" "cd react-app && yarn run start"
scripts.docker-build: docker build -t joeyjackson/shape-drawer-app . && docker build -t joeyjackson/shape-drawer-mongodb ./mongo/
scripts.docker-build-nc: docker build --no-cache -t joeyjackson/shape-drawer-app . && docker build --no-cache -t joeyjackson/shape-drawer-mongodb ./mongo/
